entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Mississauga
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:29 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 09:53 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 100 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -1.3°C
Wind: NNW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
